text: Threat Intelligence Analysts monitor external threat landscapes, track APT groups, and deliver actionable insights to internal stakeholders. Their goals include detecting emerging threats early, mapping TTPs using MITRE ATT&CK, and enabling proactive defense. They use tools like MISP, ThreatConnect, and Recorded Future. They work with SOC, IR, cloud security, and compliance teams. They prefer concise reports, dashboards, and executive briefings with priority tags. Communication is analytical and urgency-aware.

metadata.description: Tracks threat actors, analyzes TTPs, and provides strategic and tactical intelligence to SOC and leadership teams. Specializes in understanding adversary behavior and mapping threats to risk.
common_tasks: Monitor dark web and threat feeds
sample_questions: What new TTPs are emerging from FIN groups?
Which APT campaigns are targeting the finance sector?
